name: GitHub Agentic Workflows
description: Technical preview feature automating repository tasks using AI agents within GitHub Actions. Write workflows in plain Markdown instead of YAML, and let AI handle issue triage, pull request reviews, CI failure analysis, and repository maintenance. Works with GitHub Copilot CLI or other coding agents.
community_quotes: Write workflows in plain Markdown instead of complex YAML
Security-first design with read-only by default and sandboxed execution
Works with multiple coding agents - same workflow format across all engines

name: Klaw.sh
description: Kubernetes-like system specifically designed for orchestrating AI agents and workflows. Provides fleet management for AI agents with clusters, namespaces, and declarative deploys. Standalone binary with zero dependencies.
community_quotes: Giving an LLM a computer makes it way more powerful, giving it a kubernetes cluster should extend that power much further
This abstraction can scale for a good long while
Standalone binary, zero dependencies - same mental model as k8s without the infrastructure overhead
Fleet ops for agents - k8s solved deploy/observe/isolate for containers, you're mapping that to agent workers

name: Inspector
description: Visual editor for Claude Code, positioned as 'Figma for Claude Code'. Provides a graphical interface for working with Claude Code's AI coding capabilities.
